Interface IDirectoryService<T>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Base interface to service collection of entities implementing IDirectory interface.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T>
Implementations: BaseDirectoryService<T>, RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, MainDirectoryService, MergedFileService, SelectedFileService 

public interface IDirectoryService<T> : ICRUDService<T>, IService<T> where T : IDirectory

Type Parameters

T

Class implementing IDirectory interface.

IService<T>.ReadById(int)

Methods

UpdatePath(int, string)

Updates the path of directory/file associated with the element with specified identification number.

int UpdatePath(int id, string path)

Parameters

id int

The identification number of updated element.

path string

The new path.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated element or -1, if update failed.
